author: _tonysun
content: Is anyone aware that Goerli network is down?

author: jgm
content:
We appear to have some new validators on sepolia that aren't attesting, in the 1573-1778 range.  <@199561711278227457> any idea who these belong to?

And it appears that a subset of the <@&688101493978562687> validators have been offline for a few days now (200-219, 280-299).

author: jgm
content: Are you running the validators 200-219 and/or 280-299?

author: jgm
content: Ah, I was reading the table incorrectly.  The downed validators 200-219 and 280-299 are owned by <@&836981603216654336>

author: jgm
content: (Related: it would be great if <@199561711278227457> you could keep https://github.com/eth-clients/merge-testnets/tree/main/sepolia up to date when new validators are assigned to make it easier to know who to talk to when validators go offline.)
